The place to be precise called Enfretors on the other hand is located in a point where the But valley already crossed in ancient times by the Roman road Julia Augusta which connected Aquileia to Norico narrows and therefore assumed for centuries a considerable strategic importance in the control and defense of the territory.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.5)
properties.description: We found a spot to spend the night in peace on a forest road with very little traffic. After the hamlet of Oberberg we continued to climb the forest road. There is a sign with written in German continue on this road at your own risk at the start of the forest road which is no longer asphalted. It remains of fairly good quality we were in a van and had no problems. It can be more complicated with a bigger vehicle especially to find a good spot. Along the road there are several rather flat spots to stop. We chose a spot right by the road at the entrance to a field with a clear view of the valley and the mountains opposite. We were able to stretch out our hammocks and enjoy the view A small cool stream allowed us to shower. A few cars passed we received big smiles Dont hesitate to climb as much as possible until you find a good spot The GPS point shown here is not accurate at all but it indicates the forest road in question.

And a church and two  Chapels. Unfortunately the public baths were closed in the low season. Pay attention This place cannot be reached with large motorhomes as the road to it is quite narrow with stone walls on the sides. It was doable with our Mercedes Sprinter.

If you follow the path there are three stop bays on the sides and at the end of the way. All keepers are great for the night. They are all in the middle of the forest and are very quiet.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4)
properties.description: Great spot on the island of Pag but possibility for a small van only.Take a pebble path be careful some can be sharp and arrive on a direct access to the sea.The place must be frequented during the day for swimming.Quiet night.THANK YOU FOR RESPECTING NATURE AND RETURN YOUR WASTE TO KEEP THE PLACE PRESERVED.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (5)
properties.description: Parking for one night directly on the water next to the restaurant.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.6)
properties.description: Great place  Very quiet by the sea.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3)
properties.description: Two parking bays on a schooner with space for table and camping chairs. Right on a path to the sea about 30m. Lonely place enough shade and possibility to hang one or more hammocks. We were there for two nights without any problems. During the day several bathers park along the road. Access via partially very difficult gravel road in the southeast access via better way in the northwest but not registered on Google Maps only on satellite images recognizable.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.29)
properties.description: Spot next to the beach. access is an about 1km long gravelroad.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4)
properties.description: A very hidden place. The road ends at a kind of water bunker. Ideal for freestanding and beautiful view However the vehicle should not be larger than a van because the road is very narrow and overgrown. Do not be confused by the narrow street and stick to the end. Right on the water.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.25)
properties.description: Very nice place to stand with nice views of the water. We stayed here for 1 night in the off season and enjoyed it. Place is relatively flat crumbly sandy a few mosquitoes in the evening. If you position yourself properly a second van will also fit. Access narrow and partly rocky. Therefore unsuitable for mobile homes I would not try. There is the possibility to go swimming caution stones and to visit a kind of military tunnel.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.5)
properties.description: Bay with stones. Be careful not to drive too high on the stones without fourwheel drive. But feasible with a 6m panel van. Otherwise great sunset very quiet. Street leads further behind to another spot. However the path is partly overgrown and difficult to turn around.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.33)
properties.description: Nice spot right on the beach. Fewer people than on the beaches next door. It can be reached by normal car  bus 4x4 is not necessary but the vehicle should not be wider than for example a VW bus or Ford Transit otherwise scratches from the bushes are guaranteed.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (5)
properties.description: Sloping parking spot view worth it. Great for hiking. Out of season no problem as all Croatia.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (2.67)
properties.description: Free partially shaded parking spaces at a Lostplace directly on a fine pebble beach that is more frequented by locals.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (2.67)
properties.description: Nice place for a night by the sea. Close to the ferry. The place can be reached via 3 ways we recommend the one that is furthest away from the interior of the island and thus closest to the ferry to the mainland. At first we took another one but it was a bit very adventurous. In between there are locals with dogs or for a swim otherwise you are undisturbed.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.5)
properties.description: Parking on a side of a road serving only as access to the public beach 50m distance from the beach. Beach bar and restaurant on the spot. Place become completely empty during the evening  night. Weve spend the night here without any problems.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4)
properties.description: We parked here in the alcove below the street. The square can be reached a few minutes after leaving the ferry. The old town is a 10minute drive away and there are numerous shopping opportunities. We were able to spend a day and a night here undisturbed. During the day this space is used by bathers.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4)
properties.description: 12 Sept 2022 gravel area behind car park in centre of village right next to the water very large area used for parking by locals you are right in the middle of town here so very short walk to restaurants old town etc. It can be a bit noisy when other cars leave as people finish work.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.5)
properties.description: Parking lot right after the ferry with a great view

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.56)
properties.description: Beautiful spot on the heights of the village of Pag. path pebbles accessible. We spent the night there very quiet.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.88)
properties.description: Parking in the shade with many trees just before entering a hotel we have not slept there but it must be possible

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (5)
properties.description: Parking 2 places slightly sloping but with wedge its ok. 4g coverage ok road near the ferry so no noise at night and a few passages during arrivals. Very quiet night. 3 hens roam freely next to the van. The day cars park there to go to the beach all along the road

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.43)
properties.description: More space than the other two places before and no other parked cars. Couple of goats walk around here and there. Great view and you are barely visible from the houses.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.68)
properties.description: Parking space at the end of a dead end street next to a grid building. Right next to the ferry to the island of Pag. We had a onenight break going up north. Very calm not disturbed until 10am. One of the only places not on the roadside hardly visible for many km.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3)
properties.description: Parking that is paid during the day 25kn  day but is free at night and there are no camping bans. located near 2 bays and with a bar 50 meters away which closes at 20.00.

properties.name: Extra services (2.86)
properties.description: Free water at gas station non drinkable

properties.name: Extra services (5)
properties.description: The usual water dispensers at a gas station. water runs slowly. Dont know if the drinking water is either. We better filter it again. You can also buy gas here.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4)
properties.description: Very quiet and very beautiful place. Not possible for XXL vehicles Only for van and small motorhome the width being about 3 meters. Free from 10 p.m. to 9 a.m. 15 kuna day 09002200. The center is 15 minutes walk.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.07)
properties.description: Parking at the exit of Rab next to childrens games and a picnic table nice view of Rab and near a monastery

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4)
properties.description: Small harbor at the end of the street. There are several parking spaces between the trees on the right. Very quiet only a cat comes by every now and then

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4)
properties.description: Paid parking 3kn  hour 10 minutes walk from the old town of Rab. No services. We spent the night there very quiet. The seats are large enough for all sizes.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.8)
properties.description: Absolutely lonely right by the sea

properties.name: Extra services (5)
properties.description: Possibility to refill one or more 13 kg French propane cylinder. Very friendly welcome. 10 kuna per kilo

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.25)
properties.description: Free parking in any case off season located right next to Paradise Beach. Full of restaurants bars and activities nearby. No service on the parking but there are showers and toilets on the beach. We did not spend the night there but I think it must be possible.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.5)
properties.description: Massive free parking area day and night on gravel with no restriction signs to be seen.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (5)
properties.description: Dirt parking at the exit of the pier. convenient when landing on the island late at night. good night

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.25)
properties.description: Small square under the pine trees facing the sea to spend a moment

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.48)
properties.description: Perfect place for camping in the offseason on the island. Hidden in the woods. In summer the car park is probably the starting point for hiking tours. The place can be approached from two sides. The road is relatively narrow and rather not suitable for larger motorhomes.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.47)
properties.description: Large open green grassy area to park some flat surfaces around. The access road is quite small narrow and rocky but our 7m van made it. No services. Very close to the town of Lopar and the surrounding beaches are a short walk from here. This is a beautiful peaceful place on the top of a small hill surrounded by pine trees please keep it beautiful by taking all of your rubbish away and not leaving it looking like a toilet. Safe travels

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.57)
properties.description: Place on a gravel road. I didnt see any prohibition signs. Easily accessible with a van and some driving skills but its more dirt road than road. For RVs Im thinking of chances. We had a quiet night in the offseason surrounded by peace and nature. It is a wonderful point to start a hike for experienced paddlers the island of Sveti Grgur is also worth a visit with its lost place and tame deer.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.27)
properties.description: Large abandoned area near the ferry dock. Flat land space for dozens of campers access to the sea with crystal clear waters and beautiful sea view you can stand on both sides of the stone wall. Public toilets a few meters away near the boarding area 1 to use the toilets. Availability of various bars and sandwich shops in the boarding area. No problems with the police  we asked at the ferry ticket office and they assured us there is no problem. highly recommended

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4)
properties.description: Parking space on the edge of a road with little traffic out of season magnificent view. No prohibition sign.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.33)
properties.description: On the outskirts of the village on a parking lot behind the houses. We asked the locals if it was allowed and this was no problem at all. However this is the end of October. So we have no idea what this will be like during peak season. The place is located at a place where you can take a refreshing dip in the morning.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.2)
properties.description: Peaceful night a little windy but wonderful view when you wake up

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.5)
properties.description: The place is located 50m from the road. Area is flat and hidden from view by trees. Abandoned housegarage nearby

properties.name: Extra services (3.42)
properties.description: Water point. Very slow flow but with a tape on it I could read a book meanwhile 2lmin

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.62)
properties.description: Embankment in a pin on a road without traffic. Unobstructed view of the islands of Pag and Rab.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.5)
properties.description: Nice parking lot to stay overnight. There are two beautiful beaches within walking distance  there are enough parking spaces.

properties.name: Extra services (4)
properties.description: Great place to fill with water.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.96)
properties.description: Simple parking without VE. The course is free in the mild winter months. You stand directly on the sea and are right in the historic old town.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4)
properties.description: Slept here one night in our van. Sea view and just off the road but very quiet at night. Occasionally people park here for hiking.

properties.name: Extra services (2.75)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (5)

properties.name: Extra services (4.92)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4)

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.62)
properties.description: Parking near stara baska on a hill near the road to the beach not very busy at night spent a quiet night.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.08)

properties.name: Extra services (4.64)

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.33)
properties.description: Flat lawn with plenty of room to maneuver behind a field of olive trees. It is accessed via a dirt road just before the parking lot of the cable Wakepark Krk. We slept there with our 5.5m camper van one night but enjoyed our stay despite the nearby through road. 10 meters from the sea next to a beach equipped with a beach bar and a restaurant can be easily reached in 5 minutes on foot. No electricity utilities or rubbish bins. For a passing night its more than fine since in the area there are only prohibited parking spaces for camperscampsites. Please leave clean

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (2.5)
properties.description: Small path in nature no houses and some recesses to park. Only for vans with a height of not more than 2m50 and do not fear some stripes of branches. Very quiet no passage even walkers we saw only 2 in the evening. The only walker you will really see is a boar at night and the noise you will get is the road crossing further but its bearable.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.67)
properties.description: A small shaded clearing next to a gravel path very little used if not by sheep. an ideal spot for a night or two without special amenities.

properties.name: Extra services (4.64)
properties.description: Water source at the side of the road for refueling and parking plus access to Portafortuna climbing crag.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.56)
properties.description: Spot rescue to spend a night on the island of Krk where to go camping wild is a real challenge. Lets be quiet and hidden from the road and houses. We met several walkers who did not tell us anything. To access it take the path next to the small bridge. To see for motorhomes. Land not very flat.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.35)
properties.description: Paid parking on the beach in Baska. Directly opposite the Tourist Info. If you ask nicely you can stay overnight for a fee of 150 kuna.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.67)
properties.description: Small rest area along the road to Verbenico to rest in the shade of an old oak tree that seems to have over 400 years Please keep the place clean do not leave rubbish and do not use as a toilet

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.9)

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.6)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.69)

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.57)
properties.description: Large asphalted place approx. 300m from the place Carica surrounded by the green without installation. We spent 2 days and nights absolutely quiet.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.04)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.75)

properties.name: Extra services (4.6)

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.71)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3)

Although some people were paying an entry when we left on a Sunday.Easy to find a flat spot.We slept there and no one came to bother us or kick us out.There is a bar at the beach and toilets.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.43)
properties.description: A real insider tip access with a Camper Pssl 600 on the wellpaved gravel road is no problem. A mediumsized bay with a sensational view. Here and there a hiker or cyclist. On inquiries from locals or residents Austrian and Croats staying overnight is also no problem.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.67)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.2)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.8)

There werent any signs regarding parking or camper vans but it will probably be a different story in the season.

Bar staff confirmed it is possible to park all night as the bar closes at 3am Saturday.It may also be possible to park for a beach view along the front or under the trees next to the football pitch.Access is via single lane paved road. You just need to keep going past the overcrowded campsite and street parking.

But safe and flat with a beautiful view of the sea. Since it is very difficult to park with a motorhome freely we are grateful for this space.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.67)
properties.description: Several large parking spaces in the parking lot of the western village Roswell which was built as a backdrop for the Winnetou film in 2016 and is open to visitors today. The approach via a gravel road is a bit bumpy but feasible even for large motorhomes. Please do not just stand there but ask the villagers beforehand and pay the entrance to the western village if you want to see it. Entry to the film set costs 30 kuna per family or 20 kuna per adult. The opening times are as follows Tuesday  Friday 400 p.m.  800 p.m. SaturdaySunday 1000 a.m.  800 p.m. Monday closed Watch the film set. Events are held here regularly on weekends. The inhabitants of the small western village are incredibly nice and look forward to every visit. Some dogs and puppies a goat and several horses also live there. In 3 km distance there are larger bathing lakes in the south and in the northeast which are ideal for a day trip. The nature is beautiful and very spacious.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.25)
properties.description: Its a flat place behind an old restaurant abandoned closed to Vrelo cave. Theres other flat places all around but this place keeps the vehicle hidden behind the building. Theres a public mobile toilet next to the cave on the other side of the road.

properties.name: Free motorhome area (3.58)
properties.description: Snovik Spa Parking. On the site of the thermal park we read that four places are reserved for campers in the parking lot and indeed this is the case but the parking lots in question are curved not linear like for cars just around a small roundabout which allows maneuvering . An allinclusive column supplies drinking water electricity and drainage both gray and black but only with cassette or portable tank. The column is not very clean and no one to supervise it. Ive read that you can park for free while you pay for the services but since nothing is displayed at the entrance and there are no guards it can be considered free like many other Slovenian realities. Excellent if you want to spend the day at the spa or even just to sleep in safety for one night the gate is closed at midnight and reopened at six in the morning. After 10 pm it is not possible to connect they suggested either normal parking or much better a gravel square next to the stream immediately outside a bit uphill manageable with wedges.

properties.description: Opposite the parking lot a path goes down to a tunnel. You can stand in front of the tunnel during the day and at night. On the other side of the tunnel is a small pebble beach and a beach bar with music playing during the day. A truck came by in the morning so dont stand in the way but there is enough space. Unfortunately there is a lot of garbage in some places but there is also a garbage can just before the tunnel. Please take your rubbish with you or dispose of it there

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.78)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4)
properties.description: One of the many small free parking lots along this road. This one was special as it had public toilets. If toilets are not important there are places with even more stunning views andor easier access to the sea.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.83)
properties.description: Windprotected parking space near a few uninhabited houses. Spent one night here as we couldnt find access to the wild place on the dirt road nearby in the dark. Turned out to be a wonderful alternative. The houses seem deserted but it is possible that they will still be used  maintained from time to time. So check out beforehand Stayed here in August 2020. Coming from Senj after the bridge behind the empty restaurant turn left at the 60 sign. Then further left around the curve. The beginning of the street is still tarred and the houses are inhabited then it becomes a gravel road but easily accessible by bus. Steep path partly narrow. We were traveling with a Sprinter about 5m long without a 4x4. RIGHTLY NOT RECOMMENDED FOR LONGER MOBILE You can turn around at the top of the parking space. If you go past the last houses a footpath leads up the mountain and after about 10 minutes you have a wonderful view of the sea and islands but the photo was taken further above. PLEASE RESPECT THIS PLACE AND BE DISCRETE

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.47)

If you drive about 10m down a dirt road you come to a meadow that is well suited for smaller campers vans rather not for mobile homes. A few steps down there are a few benches and possibly shady places for tents. The tunnel leads to a beautiful bay that invites you to swim and snorkel. Some people with dogs are to be expected here during the day. Unfortunately we only discovered the place in the morning and then spent the day there and cooked. From the street however the place is somewhat covered by trees and could also be suitable for a night. Please leave clean

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (5)
properties.description: Nice clearing. In summer you can pick cranberries here. We spoke to two locals and they both said that it would not be a problem to stand here overnight. We stayed 2 nights. From here you can hike in about 4 km to the starting point 13th kilometer of the Begova Staza from where you can climb to the Bijelih stijene and the Samarskih stijene. Warning you cannot drive directly to the 13th kilometer from here you have to walk the 4 km We decided on this location for parking sleeping because it is definitely not in the nature reserve the 13th kilometer is on the edge of it. The nature reserve officially has the highest protection regulations that exist for nature areas. However we do not know whether these will be checked. The journey from Begova Razdoljia is about 20 minutes on a gravel road. But this has no large potholes or similar. and is easy to drive even from an old VW T4 and leads through beautiful nature

properties.description: On the foothills of the beautiful tableland golte which was declaired to the landscape parc zgornja savinjska dolina upper savinja valley a pleasent stay in the nature and atmosphere are offered. The inn atelek is wating for you with the authentic slovene hospitality. The slope suha is overgrown with fresh beech and pine forest which extends until the inn. A christallclear brook reica which rises in the karst cave upnekovo relo and gives numerous trouts their lives. Trouts are our speciality. All this is a harmony of fresh air water and rest.in the vicinity you can fish walk ride on the horseback or play tennis. There are marked walking trails on the meadows fields and in forests. A visit of the logarska dolina the valley of logarska is something special.the inn atelek and its friendly staff are wating for you with the authentic slovene hospitality.

Be sure to ask the volunteers for permission to stay the night and have your IDs scanned there to get the shelter in line with the state Youll be lucky enough to see at least a few bears 9 y are collected as well as ponies and geese pigs. They are fed around 9.20 a.m. and 6 p.m. with a little luck you will be able to attend but in winter the visits begin and end with sunrise and sunset... because be careful at night... wild bears are on the prowl Close your doors  FabriceNadia volunteer in 102021 at the shelter.

properties.description: Intersection leading to Bjele and Samarian Rocks trails. I accessed it from the south driving from Ogulin towards the coast. This main road that goes all the way to Novi Vinodolski is VERY bad full of huge cracks on the asphalt that can easily blow up your tire. Drive carefully all the way and avoid nighttime. Along the main road youll see a sign Bjele Stiene shortly afterbefore Jasenak. From there is a good 4kms of rough gravel road with plenty of potholes until reaching the parking spot. Theres space for 3 vans at most. You can either walk up to the trailhead of Bjele Stiene or drive up to the other parking lot last photograph. However the road is even worse and steeper  no motorhomes past this point Whichever choice youll have a quiet night and I doubt anyone will say anything. I stayed here for one night without problems. Its possible to carry on for another 6kms from the intersection to reach the trailhead of Samarian Stiene

The excellent Amon  wines originate from the vineyards of the marjeVirtanj winegrowing region. Several Slovenian and international awards confirm the top quality of the Amon wine.GUEST HOUSE Decorated in the rustic style of a wine cellar with details originating from the winegrowing heritage. The Amon food is based on old household recipes and made from local ecological ingredients. The estate has received the certificate for ecological farming and therefore chefs use vegetables from the Amon garden homemade productscan also be bought in their Grandmas shop. BOARDING HOUSE Situated in an oasis of greenery surrounded by a forest on one side and with an open view towards the sunny east and the golf course. Furnished with top quality ecological materials of harmonious colours. Modern conference rooms are available for business meetings and seminars.

I recommend

GPS coordinates 44.2044703 15.6667430 Google Maps does not know the path that leads there you have to choose the type of satellite map to display it.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.52)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.6)

There is a walking path that leads down to the river youll find it on the road between the bushes just a few meters from the parking spot its marked by two big piles of stones. There is a little beach down there if the water level isnt to high where we spend the afternoon swimming. 4G cellphone reception at the parking spot.KEEP THIS PLACE CLEAN PLEASE

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.67)

The view is amazing and the path seems to be an insider tip. In any case we didnt meet anyone on the way there and back in October.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.57)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.31)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.14)
properties.description: It is a gravel car park with rubbish bins and tables and benches. We spent a quiet night here. Local residents are very nice. Great view. Starting point to visit the stalactite cave.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (2.67)

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.92)
properties.description: Beautiful Spot. You hear in the distance a little bit of traffic. 2min at foot of a ruin. Water acces is difficult. Flat spot

Access possible via several paths but the branches hang very low on one driveway. Straight meadow with lots of opportunities to park everywhere along the river. However bathing is not possible everywhere water is very refreshing. Quiet even during the day. A few other bathers but spread out well.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.6)
properties.description: On the river Cetina. Quiet place near the police station some hikers asked if it was ok and safe to stay here. We have been there

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.78)

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (5)
properties.description: Quiet shaded square and on the edge of the Cetina which flows peacefully. We were able to do a canoe ride starting from the restaurant in Panj and docking here 130 or even 2 hours.We spent a night there lulled by the river and meeting adorable Croatians who came to share a festive meal a national souvenir and play their local petanque. They invited us there memorable

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.5)
properties.description: Nice corner in the middle of nature. River just below the pitch. Some locals come to bathe there. Very calm. We stayed there for several days

properties.name: Extra services (4.62)
properties.description: No water big flow. Accessible heavy weight.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.5)
properties.description: Next to or behind the soccer field 2m from the river to cool off before crossing the border or to spend a few days there its great super nice people.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (5)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3)
properties.description: Parking lot of the Grand Park Hotel Livno Kneza Mutimira 56 Livno 80101 Bosnia and Herzegovina. Ask for authorization from the management for the bivouac at the back of the hotel at the edge of the park and almost under the rooms. The place is very quiet secured by cameras and close to the police on the other side of the avenue. The wifi connection is open and free. No service and needs to be autonomous.

properties.name: Extra services (4.67)
properties.description: Threaded faucet. You can park right in front of it. The locals drink from the well themselves

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3)
properties.description: This is a parking place next to the stadium. It is also a starting point for the Livno wild horses tour. It is very much recomended to go on this tour. Very very nice. There were several campers parked some of them also over night. We were ther only for the day.

properties.name: Extra services (5)
properties.description: Drinking water source on the street. There is a large area for parking also intended for spending a night. Locals also stopped to fill their bottles. From there you can hike up Mali Dimitor 1483m.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4)
properties.description: Old quarry 200m from the road very quiet. After the sign in Serbian from the entrance to the ecovillage go 100m and take a path on the left. We had a peaceful night although the atmosphere is quite humid with the proximity of the river. Some passages nearby but no worries.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4)
properties.description: A small restaurant and pension right on the river. Food is very tasty and outrageously cheap The associated parking lot can be used for overnight stays on request. Very friendly owner. But as I said on request. You have your peace and quiet here and sleep very idyllically. The adjacent street is hardly used from 1000 p.m.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (5)
properties.description: Magnificent spot in the middle of nothing except nature and wild horses. The path to reach it is in places not at all maintained steep and difficult. The ideal is to have a 4x4 vehicle or to be very comfortable with your vehicle. We still managed to climb from Livno with our Master L3 traction 3t5 about 1 hour drive from Livno. Once at the top hundreds of wild horses and stunning landscapes as far as the eye can see. A few hundred meters away is a refuge which must be open certain months of the year. It is also the start of several hikes in particular towards Mont Cincar. We went back down on the other side towards Suhaca the road is still in worse condition than from Livno. To avoid.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.27)
properties.description: Lake Balkana near Mrkonji Grad. Most of the parkingspace is inclined but you can find a few even spots.Road can be very busy and traffic might continuing late into the night. Free WIFI close to the hotel.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3)
properties.description: This is the side road leading to the cave Vaganska peina. 30m into the side road is a place to stay overnight big enough for a large camper. If you follow the side road for roughly 1km you will get to the entrance of the cave it is directly at the end of the electricity lines but you will need an offroad vehicle or just walk.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4)
properties.description: Free parking accessible to all sizes stabilized level and shaded. The place is calm. No service but optimal satellite and 4G reception. The parking lot is 1.8 km from the center of Livno.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (5)
properties.description: A couple of large and flat parking lots suitable to stay for overnight. Quiet at night. nearby there is some kind of  water park but we did not explore what kind of entertainment it offers and if any.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (5)
properties.description: Small flat space opposite of a casle. Space for two vans. Acces start on paved road and last 100m are nice but steep gravel

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (2.75)

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.64)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.56)

properties.name: Extra services (5)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4)

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.18)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (2.5)

properties.name: Picnic area (4)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (2.75)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.33)

The place is idyllic surrounded by nature calm with the sound of water in an extraordinary setting. No service satellite reception could be improved but very good open wifi network JajceOpen.

properties.name: Picnic area (4)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.5)

properties.name: Extra services (5)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.25)
properties.description: Along the river it seems to be the parking of the student place just beside. very quiet i didnt sleep there but hear no noise from the street

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.5)
properties.description: Parking with fees directly on the river 8am9pm per hour 0.50KM 3KM for the day. For the following day payment at the machine is only possible after 9pm. Asphalted level partly under trees cafes and bars directly on site WiFi available there and partly still available at the parking lot. 5 minutes to the fortress on foot.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.67)
properties.description: Parking in the centre of the city Banja Luka near market and Kastel Fortress

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.14)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.67)
properties.description: We are going to Romania crossing Bosnia we stopped in this very large area to sleep near some trucks not being in Europe we are without internet but here we found free WiFi.

properties.name: Extra services (5)
properties.description: At the first and second petrol pumps from the left see photo water can be filled with the sufficiently long hose. However I recommend that you fill up your own fuel tank at the gas station and inform the gas station attendant about the withdrawal of water. Unfortunately there is little pressure on the water pipe so we needed about 20 minutes for 150L. The gas station attendant was not interested in the waiting time and he kept a benevolent visual contact between refueling other vehicles.

properties.name: Extra services (5)
properties.description: Very good filling point friendly staff and helped very quickly.  DIN gas bottle to fill.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.5)
properties.description: A quiet place by the footbridge over the river Vrbas.  There is a workout area next to it.  Perfect place for a night before visiting Banja Luka.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3)
properties.description: Small square at the end of a gravel  rocky path. The road is indeed passable but sometimes very narrow. Therefore not suitable for large motorhomes. Reaching the square was achievable with our VW T5. We spent a very quiet night here. Nobody came. There are several beaten paths that lead to the water. There is also a ruin of an old military position tunnel cave. You can see the lighthouse above. We were able to admire a beautiful sunset and an incredible starry sky. No prohibition signs. Definitely worth a night here Highlight of our vacation

properties.name: Extra services (5)

properties.name: Picnic area (5)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.55)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (5)

If you park on the right side of the parking lot youll catch a shade in the morning. The parking lot is right next to the sea small boats were passing through the bay in the morning but it didnt wake us up. Good spot for cars vans and smaller campervans.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (5)

There are garbage cans here on the road every few meters and nobody comes here at night during the day it is a hiking trail and the beach is not 100 meters on foot. It is a gravel road that is not particularly bad I am sure it would also be easily accessible with a truck or a larger flat. I spent one night here.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.43)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.67)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (2.5)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4)

We spend a pleasant night here at the beginning of September although no shade here so at the midsummer be prepared for early morning.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.44)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.64)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.67)

properties.name: Extra services (4.22)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.25)

And if the place is taken lower in the village there is a basketball court with a large gravel pit in front to park.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.62)

Free drinking water 20m along from carpark public waste bin and adequate shade provided. No height restrictions but standard length parking bays. The area is residential and moderately populated for a rural town you may be able to stay here overnight though we did not try.

properties.name: Extra services (3.56)

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.8)

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.5)

Relatively many young people who played at the school next door so quite loud in the evenings. Most left at ten the last at midnight. A small supermarket is in the immediate vicinity 100m. Perfect for a night in transit.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4)

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.43)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.13)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.75)

properties.name: Picnic area (4.67)
properties.description: Gravel parking with seating for groups. It has a magnificent view of the largest lake in Bosnia. This lake is artificial and is located at 715 meters high. You can swim in it. From the car park a road leads to the lake. Its 300m away but better walk not recommended with a vehicle.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4)
properties.description: Small parking lot at the beginning of a hiking trail to mount Konj and further. Outside a small village. No view. Good place when staying at the lake is too windy.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3)

This is used to clean the banks every week. We paid in exchange for an official ticket proving all the same that they are not thieves. Beautiful Sunset. the road from the west is easier than the road from the little church.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.75)
properties.description: Sweet place directly at bosnias biggest lake. Very quiet. Only sounds of waves and birds. Like at the ocean  With amazing views. We were the only camper. Seen nobody else instead of a sheep herd. They came to say hello. At night there were tons of wired mosquitos so better stay inside till sunrise Dont drive to far on the beach if your not coming with 4x4. Take your trash with you and keep the place clean and have fun in this beautiful country

properties.name: Extra services (4.25)
properties.description: German gas bottles can be refilled here by the dedicated gas station attendant. The price is based on the daily price.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.61)

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.4)
properties.description: On the shore of Buko Jezero the largest reservoir in Europe. We spent one night here without any problems and completely undisturbed. Access is unpaved but easily possible. It is located behind a newly created beautiful cemetery. You stand there on a huge grassy plain near the lake with a breathtaking view no infrastructure available.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.57)
properties.description: Parking lot of a monastery. The signs indicate Karmel the bivouac area is stabilized and the view of the lake is partial. No service available. To park it is necessary to ask the authorization of the monk on duty and a visit to the monastery is strongly recommended.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.67)
properties.description: Place at the lake with a great view spent a quiet night

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (5)

The downhill ride is very washed out narrow more of a hiking trail. We made it partly at walking pace with our VW bus. Larger vehicles should not attempt it even uphill The trail is better for 4x4 vehicles.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4)
properties.description: Small place by the gravel road for one vehicle. Not visible from the main road. Peacefull to stay overnight but very windy.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3)

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4)

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.29)
properties.description: At 1099 meters above sea level discreet bivouac in the firs on the road to Tomislavgrad coming from Scit. After several kilometers of lunar land of exceptional beauty the place is partially stabilized level and away from the road whose attendance is not a nuisance. The only downside is the waste abandoned by irresponsible people who despise nature. No service or wifi network but optimal satellite reception and serenity guaranteed. If you are lucky you will spot groups of wild horses on the surrounding hills.

properties.name: Extra services (5)

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.5)

properties.name: Extra services (2.5)

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.27)

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.39)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.65)
properties.description: Free Parking inside Market area next to Bingo. Perfect for large campers looking to visit the city for free and also great place to spend the night. Road is elivated and out of site even though its very central. This place would be unsuitable if the Market was operational however it was abandoned mid june

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.5)
properties.description: Spot not magnificent but which helps at the edge of a less busy road than the main one at the edge of the river. To reach from the city We first tried from the other side but there is an old bridge that we didnt dare cross. The road is rather bad but it is doable.

properties.name: Extra services (5)
properties.description: Drinking water with hose

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3)
properties.description: Large gravel parking lot next to Bingo shopping center. Safe and quiet overnight stay.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.67)
properties.description: Really nice clearing in the forest with picnic table. Its accessed by a gravel road which is ok but a little bumpy. Worth a visit.

properties.name: Extra services (5)
properties.description: You can fill up with water right on the street here. Parking space is enough. There are also 2 benches for a little break. The villagers fill up their water here and it tastes good.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3)
properties.description: Ideal park for the night without services close to the main road of Banja Luka but still very quiet with acceptable road noise. A 24h Pekara store bread and cakes a few meters away. Ideal to pernoitar perto da estrada for Banja Luka mas afastado or suficiente para ser calmo e silencioso dure a noite. Tem uma loja aberta 24h muito perto.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (2.75)
properties.description: After a short stretch along a gravel road you come to a small beach near the river. very peaceful and quiet right next to the water only drawback a lot of garbage in the neighborhood

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4)
properties.description: Parking near stadium Laktai

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3)
properties.description: Parking spot just next to the bridge. close to the river but not suitable for swimming. not the best spot on the world but quite and flat. There is no many options around so we decided to add it to the list. Easy access for all kind of vehicles.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.56)
properties.description: Small place by the road with a beautiful view of the sea Access narrow street and tight bend but we can turn back. No service but super resting the Vitaceae with fresh fish grilled over a wood fire and oyster soup to fall 10 min walk. Some cars pass but relatively quiet. Stayed one night without problem.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (5)
properties.description: Parking spot for Pirate bay port des pirates. Locals and fishermen during the day. Entry road is cemented were the road is steep. Road is small but ok for a T56 van. No beach but rocky spots to rest on and nice snorkeling in clear waters.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.9)
properties.description: Just a basketball court located at the bottom of a small fishing port. The no parking signs only concern the last spaces before the pitch according to locals. We spent two nights there with no problems. The port in question is not too busy with tourists and above all the Stijena restaurant is simply the best I have ever visited in Croatia in my life. See TripAdvisor reviews. In addition excursions to Miljet National Park are offered.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.29)
properties.description: Beautiful place with a small beach. After 200 m there is another small beach. we stayed overnight.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3)
properties.description: Small path along the sea where there are some sites not to block the way to spend the night. Height limited to 2 m from the branches. Small coves nearby. Thank you for preserving the cleanliness of the place.WARNING  no overnight only for the day.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.5)
properties.description: Parking spaces to go down to the beach. Parking possible for motorhomes.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (5)
properties.description: Large recently created car park. Quite flat and very close to the beach and town. Cars and motorhomes allowed. no services

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.2)
properties.description: I have a Ducato as L2H1. No fourwheel drive. A window bus. People pay attention to their streets here. This is a wellmaintained gravel road. If its wet I probably wont come up here. But today it was dry and it was worth driving up carefully in first gear. With a little momentum it would have gone up faster but I pay attention to my chassis.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.5)
properties.description: Big gravel parking spot on the edge of the road. Sloping and the gravel is a bit looserough. No signal. Lovely views and beautiful swimming cove at the end of the road. Also possibly to park there but it gets busy and is very sloping.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.5)
properties.description: Free parking near Dalmatian house Poluta Drae

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3)
properties.description: Parking on the beach. Entry limited to 2m10. Perfect for van or 4x4. flat terrain. the beach is pebble but 1m from the shore the bottom becomes sandy. View of the harbor and the sea. No services.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.69)
properties.description: Beautiful spot next to a dirt road with views across the sea. No services. If you continue down the track you can visit Odysseus Cave which is incredible and a good spot the swim. A few cars passing but generally very quiet with a nice sea breeze. Wouldnt recommend for bigger vehicles.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.67)
properties.description: Along the road small gravel car park of a chapel in the middle of the vineyards 5 minutes from the village. Stayed one night without a hitch.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3)
properties.description: A pitch with an incredible view. The parking space itself is in a curve of a gravel road. But this is almost never or not at all used you need good nerves to drive up here. But with the T5 2WD it wasnt a problem. View of the sea and the valley. Not recommended with a larger vehicle than a van except 4WD

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.88)
properties.description: We spent a first night next to the lighthouse right out of the ferry as well as a second night before taking the ferry. Very quiet location with a magnificent view of the Croatian coast There was no one at the lighthouse which may not be the case in high season ...

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (5)
properties.description: Quiet parking at the edge of a stone path in the middle of olive trees. We absolutely do not obstruct the passage. Direct access to the cave of Odysseus 19 mins on foot. Access only for vans and vans. No bitumen.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.5)
properties.description: Small square by the road nice view and very quiet. Good for a night not far from the ferry. Gravel road with a concrete portion. Ok for van and small camper. There is a small cove below but unfortunately full of waste from the sea.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (5)
properties.description: Place is next to another one with better acces to the sea. Close to the road. There was few passengers durning the day. Good for sleeping and swimming.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.33)
properties.description: Absolutely beautiful place We drove this whole gravel road from the west to the east and this is the nicest spot of them all Beautiful view 20m from the sea wonderful swimming especially in the morning Entry and exit for 2WD vehicles only from the west. We left the pleace in the east direction and only made it because of our 4x4. Very calm place no trash.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.75)
properties.description: Place for a short stop or overnight. A wine tasting across the road.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3)
properties.description: church of our Lady of the rosary spotLovely tranquil spot next to a church and cemetery.only down side can be the hunters shooting in the background which didnt bothered us.in summer park directly at the right on the gravel and you have shade in the morning

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (5)
properties.description: Nice place near the road in the morbing there are peaceful corridors the place is free and you have a nice view

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4)
properties.description: After visiting the Odysseus Cavela cave here is a quiet place where you could spend the night

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.5)
properties.description: Ideal place to start a hike and spend the night suitable for smaller campers.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (5)
properties.description: In the middle of the woods and close to the sea. Ideal for small van the road is narrow path of pebbles.

properties.name: Free motorhome area (3.4)
properties.description: Campers are already spending the night here.  It is next to the road so you shouldnt expect peace and quiet.Free electricity access possible from one point 12 1 plugs available

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.25)
properties.description: Marvelous place between the sea and the river.Abandoned kitesurfers camping.

properties.name: Picnic area (4)
properties.description: Picknickarea with toilet

The sanitary facilities are getting old and average clean. The staff a bit bored and especially in the bar at the entrance we had the feeling that we shouldnt order anything could do some work. Not worth the price we paid for one night.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.06)
properties.description: Parking between olive trees next to a cemetery. water tap and garbage cans at the cemetery.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.43)
properties.description: Quiet but slightly sloping place on a gravel road surrounded by small mountains. Seen or heard no one from 4pm to 10am.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.67)
properties.description: Small parking lot on the roadside to go swimming. Take the path to the left when you are facing the sea and at the bottom of the path go to the right a nice little cove we were alone.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3)
properties.description: A large gravel parking lot in the middle of the town. The beach is a 5 minute walk away.We stayed for 2 nights at the end of March and it was very quiet the locals didnt seem to bother us.But I dont know what it looks like in the high season.

properties.name: Extra services (4.54)
properties.description: Water fountain. Next to a bus stop.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4)
properties.description: A parking space with access to the beach. We stopped here in the morning made coffee and walked to the beach but there was a motorhome next to us that spent the night there and apparently wasnt fired. There are no prohibition signs but you shouldnt have any problem with passing cars.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3)
properties.description: City parking on the road. The fee is 160 kuna for the whole day. Payment by application. During the day the city guard comes several times and checks the fees. The beach is very small but charming. Nearby there is a concrete promenade by the sea that leads to Drvenik. We stayed 1 night with no problems.

properties.name: Extra services (4.83)
properties.description: Free drinking water right from spring. We filled our tank and bottles here. You need something to put water in.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4)
properties.description: 1 Day parking 80kn.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4)
properties.description: Free parking in the shade of the trees. Good amount of space for cars and motorhomes  parked on weekdays at end of season was quiet and on the beach front. Nice swimming area with restaurants and bars. I did not spend the night. ATM here. High season 3 per hour.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3)
properties.description: Cimetiere parking with a tap. Very calm

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (2.75)
properties.description: The place has a wonderful view and is easily accessible by car. Should be feasible for vans up to a maximum of 6 meters. Unfortunately we found and collected a lot of rubbish here. It would be nice if it stayed that way. Naturist beach 3 minutes away

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.33)
properties.description: Very nice parking area. Near a cemetery and a small chapel. Water but Im not sure its drinkable. Beautiful ocean view Easy access for 67 meters.

properties.name: Extra services (3.6)
properties.description: Gas station where u can refill water tank if asked staff. Garden tap in distance of 4meters from parking place need to have hose to get water from tap

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4)

properties.name: Extra services (4.44)
properties.description: Drinking water point. Accessible place possibility of parking next to the fountain. Good flow ideal for filling your van  motorhome. On the way to see the Spomenik Wings Monument

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.96)
properties.description: Nice and flat place just outside town. with a table and benches nextby. the wash station down the hill has fresh water.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (2.5)

Just a 2 min walk up a hill to the left and your at the beach. Stayed for 1 day and night without trouble showers and toilets available at the beach.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (2.75)
properties.description: Large flat dirt area with tall trees providing shade. near 5min walk from the beach of a hotel in Tucepi with free services for bathers. or there are paths that go to the promontory up to Makarska with beautiful free beaches in small sheltered bays. cost 70kunas per day or 10kunas per hour to be paid in cash not giving change in the tower in the street. The parking lot was very dirty with garbage but it has been cleaned personally I recommend you do the same.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.38)
properties.description: We parked here with a 7m camper. we had dinner with an amazing view and stayed one night. No one bothered us. Warning be careful with what kind of light you use artificial light on the outside of a camper We had a visit from a lot of giant wasps

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.5)
properties.description: Nice little quiet place with sea view just next to the fork in two roads one concrete the other gravel.The climb is a bit complicated and very steep with a 7m motorhome 2 hairpin bends but we get there.The view is beautiful.Locals passed by they didnt tell us anything.Only one motorhome can fit.Keep your trash to keep this place accessible.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3)
properties.description: For this place 4x4 is not required. nothing beautiful but ok for the night. quiet.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4)
properties.description: Place on the round to abounded and destroyed house. Narrow and sandy road. Nice view. we came about 7 p.m. and no one disturbed us till morning only a couple on the walk and one motorbike crossed by.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.65)
properties.description: Place in the middle of nature along a small road but very little traffic. A few cars at the end of the evening and no one at night. Nobody woke us up. The view in the morning is magnificent. Accessible by van we are 6 meters long and can access it without any problem.

properties.name: Extra services (3)
properties.description: Place with water

properties.name: Picnic area (2.5)

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.26)

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (2.67)
properties.description: Very nice spot next to the tap with mountain water and excellent view of Makarska. Local people were coming to refill their bottles with water sayin its the best in Europe. The road is steep with few turns but we made it with 7 meters long Mercedes Sprinter and stayed for a night

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.5)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.07)

properties.name: Extra services (4)
properties.description: Drinking water in a clean toilet

properties.name: Picnic area (3)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (5)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.38)
properties.description: Gas station with large parking really quite. we asked inside if it was ok to stay the night and they said of course also toilets cafe  wifi

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.9)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (2.75)

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.5)

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4)

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.36)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.88)

properties.name: Extra services (3.67)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (5)
properties.description: Beautiful pitch overlooking the lake the warden may come by and ask for money. We were completely alone without paying

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.91)

properties.name: Picnic area (4.62)
properties.description: Nice Picknick place for staying the day or one night. Little garbage around but ok.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.2)

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.6)

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.92)
properties.description: Leaning place Lakeside. Lots of fishermen

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3)

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (5)

Fantastic view of the lake the stars at night its a beautiful place. There is a campsite down by the lake the owner speaks German very well. In season you can also buy groceries there. You can take a leisurely ride around the lake by bike or on foot. There are also all kinds of hikes nearby.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3)

properties.name: Extra services (3)

Access is on the right in front of the gas station through an archway from the direction of the R413.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (2.5)
properties.description: Ski resort Vlai

Then you take the dirt road that goes to the right the paved road leads to the garbage dump on the corner.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.22)

properties.name: Extra services (4.67)
properties.description: Water fountain. Possibility of stopping easily on the side bus stop.

properties.name: Extra services (4.81)
properties.description: Drinking water under the shop on the wall.Aslo nice roofed picnic area and many benches by the bulla pool.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.75)

Bad internet connection  Spent a great night and afternoon here without any problems please keep it clean and calm so it wont be a prohibition sign here

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (5)
properties.description: Nice quiet parking space ideal for one night

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.25)
properties.description: Nice place for the night quiet and safe but very windy

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.75)
properties.description: Parking with trees near the beach. We stayed during night without any problem. We payed about 20kn.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.62)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.71)

Unfortunately a bit trashy and uncomfortable and the church bell rings at very protestant times but good location safe and nice view. Attention Payment only possible with coins in local currency.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.13)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.33)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (5)

When I arrived there were countless commuter cars and visitors to the island. Nobody worried about the fact that I slept in the car. In the morning the toilets were open. Very good reception

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (2.67)

Otherwise the place is very quiet here. Next to this place is a power house which makes a slight humming noise in the evening. The street is a bit narrow in parts but still manageable for a Bulli.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.67)
properties.description: Small public car park in a culdesac in an industrial area just behind a car wash. We spent a quiet night here waiting for the ferry to Trpanj to depart.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.67)

There were barriers but they never closed

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.2)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (2.5)
properties.description: Parking lot of a large consumer. Stood one night no problem. cozy place with many small cafes.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4)
properties.description: Nice place overlooking the bay. Located on a kind of closed water bunker. Nice place to cook and to spend the night but nothing else to do. In the distance you can see the defensive wall between Ston and Mali Ston. Only drawback you can hear the road that runs across the bay. Occasionally the pump in the water bunker will kick on not loudly. If you are coming from Mali Ston take the exit on the right after the exit to Luka. After about 2 km on the country road you come to the cape. Is visible on Google maps satellite.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.5)
properties.description: Place in the countryside where we stayed 2 days without any problem. Its officially a separation zone to a hiking trail and a bay but in 2 days we only saw one person walking his dogs. There is no service nearby. To get there turn to the sign Uvala pre  planjak. The plus is the sublime bay at the end of the path Uvala pre however be careful the path is steep and sloping.

properties.name: Extra services (3)

properties.name: Extra services (4)
properties.description: New fuel station with tap for water filling

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.36)

properties.name: Picnic area (4.75)
properties.description: Picknickarea with view to lakes. Toilet and little sale of local products.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.29)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (5)

properties.name: Extra services (3)

properties.name: Extra services (3.33)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.5)

properties.name: Extra services (5)
properties.description: Service station with coffee stop toilets bottled gas and water eau potable  we needed only water . Staff friendly.  Water is free but a pleasure to buy chocolate

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.56)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (5)
properties.description: Large easily accessible car park. We stayed 3 nights with no problems. Very calm and quiet except for the church bells at 7pm and 7pm. A few more passages on Sunday morning for Mass. We even used the wifi a bit difficult near the church. At the beginning of the parking lot there is a large garbage can an old green barrel with a hinged lid

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.67)
properties.description: Parking in ski resort next to chairlift and near the restaurant. Quiet place outside the ski season no commercial activity. Only employees at the station

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.86)
properties.description: Great place in the woods. Big enough for big campers. The trailhead is only a few hundred meters further and the road should also be easy to drive with 2wd if the weather is good. There are no signs on the abandoned houses and according to local residents there was no fighting there so there were  are no mines there.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.7)
properties.description: Small parking lot on the side of a quiet road. We stopped there for a photo and found a drinking water tap. We did not spend the night but it must be possible even if there is a nicer spot on the plateau. Mainly an interest in water.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.62)
properties.description: Parking at the start of the hike on a space at the edge of the track. No prohibition. Its flat and for once clean. Rather for van or small motorhome the track becomes stony at the end.

properties.name: Extra services (4)
properties.description: On the side of the road drinking water fountain with threaded end with collection tray. There is also a bench and a small table. River view. Nice corner to preserve and respect

properties.name: Extra services (5)
properties.description: In a service station Possibility of filling the LPG gas cylinders.

properties.name: Extra services (3)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.18)

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (5)
properties.description: beautiful place by the seaMany cottages and a playground. Around the lake there are many benches and tables and a flock of sheep with a shepherd is also on the move.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4)
properties.description: Space where you can park freely for the night by the lake of Prokosko. The price to enter the village is 2km per person and 10km for the vehicle to be able to spend the night there. There is a height bar at 2m50 but the keeper can remove it to let you pass if you are higher. The road to get there is very poorly maintained. Almost 20km on a path in very poor condition. The road coming from Sarajevo is a little easier than on the other side. The village is very nice to see and there are walks to do. There is a drinking fountain in the village near the mosque.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.5)
properties.description: The path is not too easily accessible Should be run off the main road before about 5 minutes walk. But it offers an excellent view into two valleys. In addition can be expected with an excellent sunrise or sunset.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.44)
properties.description: Its a small picnic area for locals. Its busy till the sun goes down There is a small river with super clear water. But freezing cold.Near is autocamp Bistrovo great place to stay over night.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4)
properties.description: Brilliant overnight spot next to the Kozice WaterfallOnly recommended for campervans due to the easymoderate terrain.Once you get to the point on the map  you have two options 1 driving up a steep hill on an angle or 2 turning right at a wooden sign. Turn right go 100m and youll find the park next to the wooden bench.Great park to visit the waterfall 2 minute hike to the base or for an overnight stay. The drive out here is fantastic AND you will pass a monument with ice cold drinkable water streaming through 5 taps.Note that this area does NOT have phone reception

properties.name: Extra services (5)
properties.description: Fountain of water on the road that goes up to Fojnica in the wide curve there is the possibility of parking

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.29)
properties.description: Perfect spot for a quiet nights rest at the river. beautiful view over the river. Locals use it for swimming during daytime. No traffic at night. There is a bar which is open until around 11pm.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.5)
properties.description: Large parking lot.

properties.name: Extra services (4.8)
properties.description: Drinking water at the sports field.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.5)
properties.description: At the edge of a small road with little traffic right at the edge of the water swimming possible. We just stayed for a swim but the place seemed good for the night too

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (5)
properties.description: Roadside parking spaces with mountain views and a fishing spot. Close to the road so a little noisy in the morning a few heavy goods vehicles in the evening. Troubleshoot for 1 night. Flat land max 4 vans. 3 minutes from the supermarket and 10 minutes from the ferry departure for the island of Mljet and a white sand beach and transparent water

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.33)
properties.description: Space for 2 vans great view

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4)
properties.description: Parking just after the Bosnian border before the bridge a few spaces possible for all vehicles oyster farm fishing swimming rather nice view for information it was customs who indicated this parking to me

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.5)
properties.description: Gravel parking spot on a cliff with a nice view. No shade however. We asked at the restaurant in the village below if it was OK to spend the night and they were fine as long as we dont bother anyone. Best for small to medium sized camper vans due to space and visibility.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.89)
properties.description: Small spot facing the sea at fishermen small harbour where they breed Oysters and mussels. No facilities. Very quiet place. Beautiful view quite windy and cold when we were there in late September. Space for one small camper. No trouble from any locals. Nice quiet spot

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3)
properties.description: We just stopped for lunch during the day but it sounds like a great place to sleep. It is located at the bottom of a dirt road 50m below the road. At 3 p.m. we couldnt hear the noise of the cars at all. There are two beautiful and wide places in the shade. Access to the sea is via a small alley very cute. It takes 2 min on foot.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.44)
properties.description: Small fishing port overlooking the bay feet in the water 4 seats maximum downhill a bit steep but tarred.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4)
properties.description: Narrow path suitable for smaller vehicles.  Level ground.  Surrounded by olive trees.  There was a little noise from the road.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.25)
properties.description: Below a wind turbine with a wonderful allround view. Perfect for sunset and sunrise. The place is huge gravel and flat as well as compacted. Good gravel road to get there no problem even with large motorhomes. The wind turbine sometimes makes noise and it can of course be windy. If that doesnt bother you spend a wonderful night with a wonderful view.Right next to the wind turbine there is a small bunker that is accessible.Attention Google Maps doesnt know the street yet Its best to enter VE Rudine and drive past the wind turbines to the last wind turbine at the end of the street.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4)
properties.description: Good spot for overnight stay. Close to road but quiet almost no cars at night. Good access for bigger Van. I guess with good comfort for 34 cars. We did not see any people there.

properties.name: Picnic area (4.22)
properties.description: Small parking lot directly on the street 10 spaces suitable for mobile homes. Plenty of trash cans and a view of a bay. At the end of the parking lot you can walk down to the beach 30s walk. Changing room available. Little shade. Beware of some sea urchins shoes recommended

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.22)
properties.description: Small beach  dock in a very quiet cove one minute below the main road. Access a little steep but paved. Some locals who walk their dog or come to bathe.

properties.name: Extra services (4.81)
properties.description: LPG station also for refilling propane bottles. 14 kn per liter

properties.name: Picnic area (2.5)
properties.description: Small clearing behind the bus stop. Unsure of legality but amazing view. Next to the road but minor traffic. Slight downward slope but comfortable enough for us for the night. Perfect if you are traveling between Bosnia and Dubrovnik.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.57)
properties.description: Beautiful not visible sleeping place with great sea views. Very easy to reach from the road for a dirt road there which can also be used with a normal vehicle. You are surrounded by rocks and bushes off the road. The site is suitable for a maximum of two campers. Unfortunately there is some rubbish in one place but otherwise very nice. Only about 30 meters further along the gravel road you can go into the sea.

properties.name: Extra services (3.67)
properties.description: The water was very yellowish therefore rather not suitable for drinking. Next to it is a beach with showers.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.67)

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.57)
properties.description: To spend the night in the vicinity of Slano if you are not allowed to sleep on the beach. Access road to an electrical regulation plant. We slept three nights here very quiet. Only one day came the technician of the plant to control and he told us very kindly that there were no problems.

properties.name: Extra services (4.62)

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.91)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.16)
properties.description: Parking on the side of road and sea small cove for swimming. rare picnic tables.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.46)

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (2.8)
properties.description: Super nice and quiet place. Finding it is a bit complicated because the streets are not on googel maps but feeling is ok too

To find Spot Drive south from Capljina there is a sign to the left across a small bridge for HUTOVO BLATO. Go right there next to the car dealership there is an entrance. Follow the road for 2 km.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.38)

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4)

Only out of season because the bars that line the edges of the waterfalls are open in summer. In addition there are fireplaces and spaces for cooking over a wood fire. We stayed there for a week. No other service but we drank water from the river. in season possibility to stay in the parking lot of the 2nd bar by asking and consuming something toilets available and clean

properties.name: Extra services (4)

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (2.67)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.17)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4)

You feel a bit like being in Africa and Mongolia at the same time. In the morning a farmer and his kids came by to collect wood nearby otherwise we were completely alone.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (5)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.8)

Possibility of boat trip to discover the park and its fauna. Picnic table. Restaurant at Motel Park where you can pay by card. For the rest payment in cash only at the house of the park friendly welcome in English.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.33)

Sadly not free of trash but you can help by taking some with you.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.83)

To access it you go through a paved but narrow street the train tracks are very close but if a train passes by it is not annoying we only hear one at night and in the morning we hear another.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3)

properties.name: Extra services (5)

properties.name: Picnic area (3.3)

But none of them caused any problem. water is easily approachable.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.59)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.4)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (2.5)

Also WiFi available from the bar next to the parking area.. obviously go for a drink etc and get the details

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3)

Notes From here the croatian troops bomb the old city of Mostar.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.62)
properties.description: Great place on the water quiet. Asked the neighbors if we could stand there no problem
